Subject: Probation Period Extension


Dear {{ doc.employee_name }},


Please note that your probation period has been extended for the next {% set raw_months = doc.custom_extended_period / 30 %}{% set months = raw_months if raw_months % 1 else raw_months | int %}{{ months }} months. We will schedule your PIP meeting with your direct reporting manager and HR to discuss the areas of improvement and the support required to enhance your performance within the extended probation period.



Regards,

Human Resources
